titles.title: Twin Falls County Landfill Act of 1993
Twin Falls County Landfill Act of 1994
Twin Falls County Landfill Act of 1994
A bill to convey a certain parcel of public land to the county of Twin Falls, Idaho, for use as a landfill, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10853)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of the Interior, and Office of Management and Budget.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 103-610.
Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Late Referral to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands (Jul 11, 94).
Hearings Held by the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands Prior to Referral.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held and Forwarded to Full Committee by the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands Prior to Referral by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 103-589.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 326.

action.text: Mr. Vento moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

bill.summary: 3/25/1994--Passed Senate amended. Twin Falls County Landfill Act of 1994 - Transfers specified Federal lands, except for reserved subsurface minerals, to the County of Twin Falls, Idaho, effective on the tender by the County of the fair market value for such lands to the Secretary of the Interior. Withdraws the conveyed lands from U.S. mining, mineral and geothermal leasing, and mineral materials laws.
